japanese: あー……疲れた……。
translation: Ahh... I'm so tired…

japanese:
お疲れ様。
スーツ返してくるね。
translation:
Good work today.
I'll return your suit.

japanese: サンキュー、らいは。
translation: Thanks, Raiha.

japanese:
しっかり旦那さんしなきゃダメだよ。
お兄ちゃん。
translation: You have to be a responsible husband, big bro.

japanese: らいはちゃんも、今日はありがと。
translation: Thank you too, Raiha-chan.

japanese: あっ、四葉さん。
translation: Ah, Yotsuba-san.

japanese:
お疲れ様でした。
これから、よろしくお願いします。
translation:
Good work today, too.
From now on, please take care of me.

japanese:
くううう～！
らいはちゃんは相変わらず礼儀正しくて可愛い！
translation:
Awwww!
Raiha-chan, you're always so polite and cute!

japanese:
そんなこと言われたら、
思わずハグしそうになっちゃう！
translation:
If you say something like that,
I just feel like giving you a hug!

japanese: あはは、もうしてるしー。
translation: Ahaha, you're already doing it.

japanese: 四葉は四葉で、相変わらずらいはが大好きだな。
translation: Yotsuba, you still love Raiha as always, don't ya.

japanese: ほら、お兄ちゃんも。
translation: Come on, you too, big bro.

japanese:
ん？　なんだ？
俺は別にお前とハグするつもりはないぞ。
translation:
Hm? What is it?
I don't have any intention of hugging you, by the way.

japanese: そうじゃなくて。
translation: That's not what I mean.

japanese:
これからは、夫婦として
四葉さんに面倒見てもらうんだよ？
改めて、ちゃんとお願いしておかなきゃ。
translation:
From now on, as a married couple,
Yotsuba-san will take care of you, right?
You have to properly ask her, again.

japanese:
はあ？
なんで俺が……。
translation:
Huh?
Why do I...

japanese: もー、お兄ちゃんは。
translation: Oh, come ON, big bro.

japanese:
四葉さん。
あんなお兄ちゃんだけど、
今後ともよろしくお願いします。
translation:
Yotsuba-san,
even though my big bro is like this,
please take care of us from now on.

japanese: はい、こちらこそよろしくお願いします。
translation: Yes. I'll be counting on you too.

japanese:
お兄ちゃん？
四葉さんに面倒かけちゃダメだからね？
translation:
Big bro?
Don't give Yotsuba-san a hard time, okay?

japanese:
こいつが大学を卒業するまで、
どれだけ俺に面倒をかけたか知ってるか？
translation:
Do you know how much trouble
she caused me until she graduated from college?

japanese:
あはは。
そんな過ぎたことを言われてもね？
translation:
Ahaha.
That's all in the past, isn't it?

japanese:
そうだよ。
お兄ちゃん、カッコ悪い。
translation:
That's right.
Big bro, you're not cool.

japanese:
くっ……。
俺に味方はいねぇのか。
translation:
Ooof...
Is there no one on my side?

japanese: 妹はいつだってお姉ちゃんの味方なんだよ。
translation: Sisters always take the side of their big sis!

japanese:
はっ！？
もしかしていま、私――
translation:
Huh?!
Could it truly be%p-2;――%p;?

japanese:
らいはちゃんに
お姉ちゃんって呼ばれちゃった！？
translation: Did Raiha-chan just call me her big sis?!

japanese:
別に変じゃないだろ。
らいははもうお前の義妹になったんだ。
translation:
It's not a big deal, is it?
Raiha's already your sister-in-law.

japanese:
そっかぁ。
らいはちゃん、本当に私の義妹になったんだぁ。
translation:
I see.
Raiha-chan, you've truly become my sister-in-law.

japanese: しかも合法的に！
translation: Also, legally!

japanese:
私、四葉お姉ちゃんとデートしたいなー。
たまにはこっちへ戻ってきてね？
translation:
I want to go on a date with you, big sis Yotsuba.
Please come back here once in a while, okay?

japanese: するする！　もちろんする！
translation: Yes, yes! Of course!

japanese:
やった！
じゃあ、いまからデートの計画立てておくね。
translation:
Yay!
Then, I'll start planning our date starting now!

japanese:
らいはちゃんの行きたい所なら、
どこにだって連れて行ってあげちゃう！
translation:
I'll take you anywhere you want to go,
Raiha-chan! Anywhere you like!

japanese:
ったく……。
お前、実は本気で
らいは目当てで俺と結婚したんじゃないだろうな？
translation:
Oh, come on...
Did you actually marry me because
you were aiming for Raiha?

japanese:
うわぁ～。
お兄ちゃん、実の妹にまで嫉妬？
translation:
Wow.
Big bro, are you even jealous of your own sister?

japanese: ち、違うわっ！
translation: Th-that's not it!

japanese:
そんなに心配しなくたって大丈夫。
だって――
translation:
You don't have to worry so much.
Because%p-2;――

japanese: 私の一番はいつだって風太郎だもん。
translation: You've always been my number one, Futaro.

japanese: ぐっ……。
translation: O-oh...

japanese: もう、仲良しだな～。
translation: Oh my GOSH, you two are so close.

japanese:
もちろんだよ。
ね？　風太郎。
translation:
Of course.
Right, Futaro?

japanese: ……お、おう。
translation: ...Y-yeah.

japanese:
ごちそうさまです！
お邪魔そうだし、私はさっさとスーツ返してくるね。
translation:
Thank you for the meal!
I'll return your suit quickly, since I'm intruding.

japanese: ったく、らいはのヤツ……。
translation: Geez, that Raiha...

japanese:
らいはちゃんも大きくなったね。
風太郎、もう敵わないんじゃない？
translation:
Raiha-chan has grown up too.
Futaro, you can't compete with her anymore, can you?

japanese:
いつの間にか高校生だからな。
お手上げだ。
translation:
Well, she's already a high school student now.
So, I give up.

japanese:
高校生かぁ。
私たちが出会った頃は、まだ小学生だったのに。
translation:
A high school student, huh?
When we first met, she was still in elementary school.

japanese:
……５年か。
これで、ようやく一段落だな。
translation:
...It's been five years.
Finally, we can take a breather.

japanese: 私も緊張の糸が解けて、一気に疲れがきたよ……。
translation:
I feel like the tension has been set free,
and exhaustion has hit me all at once...

japanese: やっぱ、お前も緊張してたんじゃねーか。
translation: You were nervous too, weren't you?

japanese:
あはは、風太郎ほどじゃないけど。
誓いのキスの時、手、ブルブルだったもん。
translation:
Ahaha, not as much as you, Futaro.
When it came to our wedding kiss,
your hands were trembling.

japanese: あ、あれは仕方がねーだろ！
translation: Well, it couldn't be helped!

japanese: みんな見てるし、お前とだって……。
translation:
Everyone was watching,
and, it was kissing you...

japanese: 風太郎？
translation: Futaro?

japanese: ５年前のことを思い出してな……。
translation: You don't remember what happened five years ago...

japanese:
パニクって記憶が不確かだったが、
お前に言われてはっきり思い出した。
translation:
Sorry, I panicked, and my memory was foggy at first,
but when you mentioned it, I remembered clearly.

japanese:
５年前の春の旅行。
あの鐘がある見晴らしのいい丘でのこと。
translation:
The spring trip, of five years ago.
On that hill with a beautiful view and a bell.

japanese: あれは、やっぱり……。
translation: That was, indeed...

japanese:
失礼いたします。
新婦様、控室にお忘れ物がございました。
translation:
Excuse me.
The bride, left something in the waiting room.

japanese: わっ、ありがとうございます。
translation: Oh my, thank you very much.

japanese:
ごめんなさい。
やっぱり、もういらないので捨てておいてください。
translation:
I'm sorry.
Actually, I don't need it anymore,
so please throw it away.

japanese: かしこまりました。
translation: Understood.

japanese:
いいのか？
トレードマークだろ。
translation:
Is that okay?
It's your trademark, right?

japanese:
いいんだよ。
どんなにそっくりでも……。
translation:
It's fine.
No matter how well it defines my look...

japanese: 私に気づいてくれる人がいるから。
translation: There'll always be someone who notices me.

japanese: どうしてもっと早く言わなかったんだ。
translation: Why didn't you say it earlier?

japanese:
ごめんね。
風太郎には伝えたいことが、
もっとたくさんあるんだ。
translation:
I'm sorry.
There are so many things I want to tell you, Futaro.

japanese: な、なんだよ。
translation: L-like what?

japanese: ふふっ、それはね……。
translation: Heehee, well...
